Based on the user's preferences, I recommend "Jurassic Park" and "The Green Hornet." 

"Jurassic Park" is a classic science fiction movie that revolves around a group of scientists who build a dinosaur theme park in Hawaii, and when the power fails after the dinosaurs start to run loose, the group of scientists has to fight against the dinosaurs and also against those who are trying to destroy the dinosaur theme park. 

"The Green Hornet" is another classic science fiction movie that revolves around a newspaper publisher named Jim "The Green Hornet" Carter, and his Korean servant known as Kato, who together operate an anonymous vigilante group known as the "Lucky Seven"."
